sentences: Tema on nõid ja teeb imesid.
Nõid kasutas oma võimsust headeks eesmärgiks.
Vanad lood räägivad salapärasest nõiast metsa sügavuses.
context: The Estonian word 'nõid' refers to a witch or magic practitioner who uses supernatural abilities. It can be used for both male and female practitioners, though in English the term 'witch' is often associated with females while 'sorcerer' might be more commonly used for males. In traditional Estonian folklore, nõidus (magic) was an important part of folk beliefs and healing practices.
